owl:Ontology.rdfs:comment: An ontology to integrate concepts in engineering towards enabling autonomous automation

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relates an acutator to the port of a component where the action is effective

A peripheral (sensor or actuator) may be related to a port in such a way that the variable it act upon or observes is primarily located at the port. For example, to state heating coil air outlet temperature, or pump inlet valve.
Relates a sensor to a port where a variable is observed

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A concept that is used to describe what the technical system is expected to achieve. The modeling of sub-classes tend towards goal-oriented requirements engineering.
